p: Orbis Clinical is seeking a remote-based R Programmer for a remote contract role (EST or CST). The ideal candidate will be a Statistical Programmer with both strong SAS programming experience and R skills to join our client's Early Phase Programming Team.
p.2: The preferred R stack experience includes dplyr, rmarkdown, dbplyr, ggplot2, roxygen, and plotly to solve complex challenges.
p.5: =C2=B7 Creating WaterFall, Swinlane and Spider plots in R
p.6: =C2=B7 Writing SAS Programs to create TFLs for Early Development Studies.
p.7: =C2=B7 Oversight QC of Vendor outputs and data.
p.8: =C2=B7 Knowledge about CDISC standards, creating data packages, Pinnacle 21 reports is a must.
p.9: =C2=B7 Use data and visualizations (R-shiny) to inform business solutions
p.10: =C2=B7 Organize data, analysis, reports, and applications into reproducible repositories
p.14: =C2=B7 6+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining SAS code
p.15: =C2=B7 5+ years of experience in designing, developing, and maintaining R code
p.16: =C2=B7 Must have experienced working in clinical trials (Pharma, CRO or Biotech)
p.18: =C2=B7 Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
p.19: =C2=B7 BS in Computer Science, Statistics or similar required
p.20: =C2=B7 US applicants only, W2 or C2C
